parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for intersection of terrain between two ASL positions. Returns [[true]] if intersects with terrain.
For AGL variant, see [[terrainIntersect]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[terrainIntersectASL]] [pos1, pos2] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1, pos2]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionASL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionASL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersectASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPosASL]] [[player]], [[getPosASL]] chopper];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersectASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[eyePos]] enemy1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[lineIntersects]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[checkVisibility]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<dd class="note">Please note the difference :
* terrainIntersect
* terrainIntersectASL
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''With
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''Objs 
* intersect

<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Rocket|Rocket]]
<dd class="note">This command is CPU intensive on the engine, be careful with its use.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 2, 2019 - 20:29 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:bloodwyn1756|bloodwyn1756]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If one of the two positions is below sea level, the command always returns true.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
